rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small foyer with storage area, Vastu-aligned entrance to allow positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional dining space integrated with kitchen area, promoting interaction.

openings.details: Large entrance door aligned with Vastu, ensuring good energy flow.
Expansive window for natural light in living room and courtyard view.
Balcony overlooking the central courtyard to enhance ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with walk-in closet and attached bathroom, positioned in the north-east corner for good luck.

rooms.name: Bedroom_1
rooms.description: Guest bedroom located near the central corridor for easy access.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Multi-functional room that can be used as a study or office, benefiting from natural light.

openings.details: Large windows to maximize morning sunlight in master bedroom.
Skylight over the central corridor for enhanced natural ventilation and light.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry, storage, or additional bathroom facilities.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Secondary bathroom to serve the utility area and guest bedroom.

openings.details: Small windows for adequate ventilation in utility spaces.
